text: The "pot-au-feu" is as much a national institution in France as is tea drinking among ourselves and it is prepared at least once a week in every bourgeois household. Thackeray, of course, waxed enthusiastic about Bouillabaisse and sang - This Bouillabaisse a noble dish is, A sort of soup, or broth, or brew, A hotch-potch of all sorts of fishes That Greenwich never could outdo; Green herbs, red peppers, mussels, saffron, Soles, onions, garlic, roach and dace.
handwritten_text: The "pot-au-feu" is as much a national institution in France as is tea drinking among ourselves and it is prepared at least once a week in every bourgeois household. Thackeray, of course, waxed enthusiastic about Bouillabaisse and sang - This Bouillabaisse a noble dish is, A sort of soup, or broth, or brew, A hotch-potch of all sorts of fishes That Greenwich never could outdo; Green herbs, red peppers, mussels, saffron, Soles, onions, garlic, roach and dace.
